author: Caitlin Welsh
title: 'He's like Angry Tinkerbell:' Stephen Colbert explains Trump's backing of social distancing protests
description: It’s *checks notes* eleventween days into lockdown, and we’re all starting to get, as Stephen Colbert puts it, “a little kooky in the ol’ squirrel cage.” For me, that’s manifesting as a desire to read a lot of murder mysteries. For Colbert, it’s work-drinking…
content: Its *checks notes* eleventween days into lockdown, and were all starting to get, as Stephen Colbert puts it, a little kooky in the ol squirrel cage. For me, thats manifesting as a desire to read a lot of murder mysteries. For Colbert, its work-drinking and in… [+1122 chars]
